Name: Sidecar Named Desire
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Take a classic Sidecar and add some love interest - apples!
History: See our Sidecar cocktail page for the full story behind the origins of the Sidecar, its history and variations .
Nutrition: One serving of Sidecar Named Desire contains 194 calories
